credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Competition Design for La Fenice, Venice: Plan of Upper Floor of the Theater
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli (1845-1926), Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink; brush and gray wash, watercolor over graphite on two sheets of white laid paper joined at center laid down on blue paper with added border of blue paper.
description: Plan of upper floor of theatre with horseshoe shaped section at bottom of image.
name: Drawing
